name: 2 Handrolled Honeycomb Beeswax Taper Candles
description:
A pair of 8 inch 100% Pure Beeswax Handrolled Taper Candles.

These are the perfect candles for someone who does not want a scented candle but enjoys the romantic glow and their healthy benefits. This candle has a sweet natural honey scent with the beautiful honeycomb texture bought straight from the Beekeeper. There are no additives like many others have.

They have an extended burning time of up to 5 hours each. Each candle is made with Cotton lead-free wicks. They burn drip-free in a draft free environment which leaves your table clear of wax spills.

Great for your dinner table and parties. Looks inviting amongst a group of votives and looks stunning in a candelabra.
These will fit any standard sized candle holder. Order is for 2 candles. Keep them or give away 1 as a gift!

Size: 8inch High x 3/4inch Round
Quantity: 2

~Custom Ideas and Wholesale Welcome~


~Custom Ideas and Wholesale Welcome~

*Shipping*
The candles are packaged carefully so they get to you just as they have been made. Shipping is from Sydney, Australia by Australia Post.

Australian Customers~ I use Regular Parcel Post and it can take up to 6 days to arrive. Express Post or Registered Post is available upon request.

Please ask for additional information and pricing.

name: One Block of Pure Beeswax*Great for Lip Balms, Body Products, Soap Making, Leather & Encaustic Art
description:
1 (One) Block of Pure Beeswax Block

100% Pure Unbleached Beeswax which is straight from the Beekeeper to You!

**25% OFF**

was$6 now$4.80

**Uses for Beeswax**
-Cosmetics, lip balms, lipsticks, moisturizers, body
butters
-Candle making
-Soap making
-Encaustic Art
-Batik and textiles
-Sewing, strengthens gives needles a smooth coating for no
sagging or catching
-Furniture polish
-Leather Waterproofing
-Conditioning of wood items
-Lubrication of screws, windows, drawers, rusty nuts
- Archery bows, protects bowstring from the environment.
& Much more.........

Color: Natural
Weight: 3-4oz. (110g)
Size: 8.5cm x 5.5cm x 2.5cm

Please contact if you need more than 1 block. 
http://beesandme.bigcartel.com/contact


****************************
Furniture Polish Recipe
****************************
200 grams olive oil
50 grams beeswax
10 drops lemon essential oil or lavender essential oil

Measure and warm the olive oil and beeswax together on the stove top until the beeswax has melted. Remove from heat and stir well. Add the essential oil and stir well again to combine. Decant and let set. To use, dab a bit of the polish on a lint free cloth and rub into the furniture until a soft shine appears.
